summary: Completed testing of 3 P0 bugs for TVDEFleet application. All 3 bugs are FIXED and verified through both backend API tests and frontend UI tests.

bug_1_templates_contrato.description: Templates de contrato não aparecem na dropdown para parceiros na página CriarContrato
bug_1_templates_contrato.verification: Backend API returns 4 templates for parceiro. Frontend dropdown shows all 4 templates: aluguer, Teste Template Parceiro, TEST_Template Teste (x2)

bug_2_documentos_motorista.description: Erro ao carregar documentos de motoristas para parceiros
bug_2_documentos_motorista.verification: Backend API accepts document upload (returns 200). Frontend shows Documentos tab with 9 file upload inputs for different document types

bug_3_veiculos_lista.description: Erro ao carregar lista de veículos
bug_3_veiculos_lista.verification: Backend API returns 9 vehicles. Frontend shows 'Mostrando 9 de 9 veiculos' with all vehicle cards displayed correctly

context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 P0 bugs have been verified as fixed. The parceiro user (parceiro@tvdefleet.com) can now: 1) See templates in CriarContrato dropdown (4 templates), 2) Upload documents for motoristas in FichaMotorista page, 3) View vehicles list (9 vehicles). Backend tests in /app/tests/test_p0_bugs_iteration13.py can be reused for regression testing.
